mapper.sql: id, visibility, create_time, last_update, image, `name`, sale_count, telephone, adress, manager_id

insert into tb_shop

update tb_shop set visibility = #{visibility,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_update = #{lastUpdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, image = #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sale_count = #{saleCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, adress = #{adress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, manager_id = #{managerId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select s.id,s.image,s.name,s.telephone,s.adress,m.user_name from tb_shop as s left join tb_manager as m on s.manager_Id=m.id
